title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sky’s the limit with crew operations modernization for United Airlines(AIM2200)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 联合航空公司机组运营现代化，天空无限(AIM2200)
abstract: United has embarked on a modernization program for the team central to achieving its mission of “connecting people” and “uniting the world”: flight crews. For crew operations, real-time visibility, collaborative communication, and streamlined scheduling tools are essential for fast responses during IRROPS, optimize resource usage, and on-time departures. United partnered with TCS to transform crew operation’s tools and processes. TCS leaders will discuss approach to modernizing United’s legacy systems on AWS to build UCREW, a crew tracking and monitoring platform. Sean Carson, United Airlines Managing Director, will share how UCREW has enhanced operational agility, improved decision-making, and affirmed system reliability and resiliency. This presentation is brought to you by Tata Consultancy Services, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 美联航启动了一项现代化计划,旨在升级其实现"连接人们"和"团结世界"使命的核心团队:飞行机组人员。对于机组运营而言,实时可见性、协作沟通和简化的排班工具对于在非正常运行情况下快速响应、优化资源使用和准点起飞至关重要。美联航与塔塔咨询服务公司(TCS)合作,转型机组运营的工具和流程。TCS领导者将讨论在AWS上现代化美联航遗留系统以构建UCREW(机组追踪和监控平台)的方法。美联航董事总经理Sean Carson将分享UCREW如何增强运营敏捷性、改善决策制定,并确保系统可靠性和弹性。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴塔塔咨询服务公司提供。

presenter.name: Sean Carson
